description:
Search and shop the web fast with Search Buttons. Type your search term(s) in the upper text box and press the button of the website your want to search. Voila! The browser opens and the results will be there. It's that easy. Search Buttons clears the text box so you can search with ease all day long. Most popular website are there for the searching. Also we've included a URL launcher to easily type your website addresses and open them. Just type or paste the website you want to go to, hit the URL Launcher button and the browser will open that address. It's that easy. See the screenshot and the list below for all the websites included:

Google
Amazon
Wikipedia
YouTube
eBay
Dictionary
Bing
IMDB
Google Images
Google Translate
Google I'm Feeling Lucky
Wunderground
Urbandictionary
Merriam Webster

URL Launcher
Yahoo Finance
Bing Products
Bloomberg Stock Quotes
MarketWatch Stock Quotes
Google Products
Google News
Scroogle
Google Local
IXQuick
DuckDuckGo
Yahoo
Yellow Pages
Wall Street Journal
New York Times
All Recipes
WebMD
